item.title: Centum Electron Joins MomentumNow Stocks on Strong Financial Upswing
item.description: Centum Electron, a small-cap industrial manufacturing company, has been added to the MomentumNow Stocks list as of 20 February 2026, reflecting its robust financial performance and improving market sentiment. The stock’s recent quarterly results demonstrate significant growth across key metrics, positioning it favourably within a strategy focused on capitalising on stocks exhibiting strong fundamental and technical momentum. Time: Feb 20 2026 10:30 PM IST

item.title: Quarterly Earnings Review: Mixed Results Across 4,085 Stocks in Dec-2025 Quarter
item.description: The December 2025 quarterly earnings season has unfolded with a nuanced picture across market capitalisations and sectors, as 4,085 companies declared results. While the overall proportion of positive earnings outcomes edged up to 46.0%, mid-cap stocks outperformed with a 52.0% positivity rate, signalling pockets of strength amid broader market caution. Time: Feb 20 2026 09:00 PM IST

item.title: Are CIE Automotive India Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: CIE Automotive India Ltd's latest results show record revenue growth of 13.42% year-on-year, but profitability has declined, with operating margins under pressure due to rising costs. Overall, while revenue performance is strong, the company faces significant operational challenges. Time: Feb 20 2026 07:11 PM IST

item.title: Are ABB India Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: ABB India Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results show strong revenue growth with record net sales of ₹3,557.01 crores, up 22.14% year-on-year, but profitability is under pressure, with a significant drop in operating margin to 15.63% and a slight decline in net profit. Overall, while revenue performance is robust, challenges in maintaining profitability raise concerns for future sustainability. Time: Feb 20 2026 07:11 PM IST

item.title: Are Sattva Sukun Lifecare Ltd latest results good or bad?
item.description: Sattva Sukun Lifecare Ltd's latest Q3 FY26 results are concerning, showing a net loss of ₹0.69 crores and a 66.21% drop in revenue to ₹5.69 crores, indicating significant operational challenges and a shift from profitability to losses. Time: Feb 20 2026 07:11 PM IST

item.title: ARCL Organics Ltd Forms Death Cross, Signalling Potential Bearish Trend
item.description: ARCL Organics Ltd, a micro-cap player in the Commodity Chemicals sector, has recently formed a Death Cross, a significant technical indicator where the 50-day moving average crosses below the 200-day moving average. This development signals a potential deterioration in the stock’s trend and raises concerns about sustained bearish momentum in the near to medium term. Time: Feb 20 2026 06:00 PM IST
